verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He gave me new life,
Something to hope for.
When I would have died,
He gave me something to live for.
Now as I press toward
The goal that lies before me,
O, Hallelujah!
He gave me new life.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Me dio nueva vida, una esperanza.
Cuando debia morir, el me dio nueva vida.
Y ahora cuando camino a la meta que hay delante,
O, aleluya!
Nueva vida me dio.
